name: The Swedish Investor
profile:
Thank you for checking out The Swedish Investor. My name is Erik Abrahamsson, and on this channel, I will share with you the most successful strategies for taking your personal finance and investing to the next level, in a SIMPLE and ENJOYABLE way.

On this YouTube channel you will find solid advice from the most successful money managers and investors of our time. My goal with the channel is to help you improve your skill-set and adopt the right mind-set, so that you can take FULL CONTROL over your financial life. And not just take control of, but to EXCEL, and reach financial abundance.

Be sure to comment and let me know what kind of videos (book summaries, or others), that you'd want to see on this channel in the future.

Talk soon, and keep CRUSHING IT!

Feel free to contact me on: theswedishinvestoryt@gmail.com
